title: Intro to Vampirism
description: College is hard. Waking up as a vampire after a college party is harder.Join Chloe while she battles sunlight during her Power Point presentation, decides whether she has feelings for her ex best friend or simply wants to eat him, develops a way too complicated relationship with one smoking vampire and accidentally forms a cult. Oh, and she might fight the forces of evil. Eventually. As soon as she passes Microbiology.
author: Nella Thorn
